channel.title: How to make Dummy's give you xp?
channel.description: Ok well i have a 508 mezzy source based and the atking styles are f'd up so i need to know how i can make dummys, etc atkable and give you certain exp. So i need a dummy to give me str xp and i want it to give me 200xp per hit, how do i do this? and what files do i add it too?
